text: is a Japanese ice hockey player for Toyota Cygnus and the Japanese national team. She participated at the 2016 IIHF Women's World Championship.2016 World Championship roster Shiga competed at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Japanese women's ice hockey defencemen Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Japan Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Aoi Shiga
